title: I recently got scammed by an online thrift store on instgram
selftext:
I was recently tryna buy a windbreaker jacket from a thrift store on instagram which was based in JMU. They had posted a lot of screenshots of the postive reviews from their customers on their highlights(ig now those reviews were fake af) and they had like over 1000 plus followers as well... These ppl told me that they had shipped my order nd when I started asking them for the order ID nd such infos they blocked me the next day. I had made the payment through a UPI app

So next time guyss when you tryna buy something of these so called thrift stores nd such try getting their legit numbers and make sure to call them before ordering nd confirm whether its their number as well.
